00002 /*
00003 *********************************************************************************************************
00004 *  File: app_main.c
00005 *  Author: Omer Farooq
00006 *  Date:   20-January-05
00007 *  
00008 *  Startup application level code.
00009 *
00010 *  NOTE: Some comments in this file are from the original code (app.c) 
00011 *********************************************************************************************************
00012 */
00013 
00014 /*
00015 *********************************************************************************************************
00016 *                                             INCLUDE FILES
00017 *********************************************************************************************************
00018 */
00019 #include <includes.h>
00020 
00021 /*
00022 *********************************************************************************************************
00023 *                                             MACROS 
00024 *********************************************************************************************************
00025 */
00026 #define  TOTAL_USER_TASKS        2   /* Define each task stack size as 64 bytes */
00027 #define  TASK_STK_SIZE          64  /* Each task's stack size */
00028 #define  TASK_SHELL_STK_SIZE   128  /* Each task's stack size */
00029 
00030 /*
00031 *********************************************************************************************************
00032 *                                             LOCAL VARIABLES 
00033 *********************************************************************************************************
00034 */
00035 OS_STK   TaskStartStk [TASK_STK_SIZE];          /* Stack for the Task */ 
00036 
00037 #ifndef ENABLE_SHELL_EN 
00038 OS_STK   TaskOSShellStk [TASK_SHELL_STK_SIZE];          /* Stack for the Task */
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 /*
00042 *********************************************************************************************************
00043 *                                            FUNCTION PROTOTYPES 
00044 *********************************************************************************************************
00045 */
00046 void TaskStart(void *data);             /* Function prototypes of Startup task  */
00047 
00048 /*$PAGE*/
00049 /*
00050 *********************************************************************************************************
00051 *                                        main
00052 *
00053 * Description: This function is entry point to user code after reset code.
00054 *
00055 * Arguments  : none (2400, 8N1)
00056 *
00057 * Returns    : int
00058 *
00059 * Note(s)    : 
00060 *********************************************************************************************************
00061 */
00062 int main(void){
00063    WDTCTL = WDTPW + WDTHOLD;          /* Disable the watchdog timer   */           
00064 
00065    InitHW();                                                /* Initialize the hardware */
00066    TACTL    = TASSEL1 + TACLR;         /* Configure TIMERA for the system Tick source. */
00067    TACTL   |= 0x00C0;                  /* Clear the Timer and set SMCLK (7.38Mhz) as the source. */ 
00068    TACCTL0  = CCIE;                    /* Input divider is /8.         */                           
00069    TACCR0   = 9216;                    /* Enable the TACCR0 interrupt. */                           
00070                                        /* Load the TACCR0 register.    */   
00071    OSInit();                           /* Initialize uC/OS-II  */
00072  
00073    OSTaskCreate(TaskStart, (void *)0, &TaskStartStk[TASK_STK_SIZE - 1], 1);  /* Create a startup task */
00074 
00075    InitSerialInterface();       /* Initialize the Serial Interface */
00076 
00077 #ifndef ENABLE_SHELL_EN
00078    OSTaskCreate(OSShellTaskStart, (void *)0,    /* Create a OS Shell Task task */
00079       &TaskOSShellStk[TASK_SHELL_STK_SIZE - 1], 2);  
00080 #endif
00081 
00082    OSStart();                             /* Start multitasking   */ 
00083    return(0);                             /* we should never get here */ 
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 /*$PAGE*/
00088 /*
00089 *********************************************************************************************************
00090 *                                        TaskStart
00091 *
00092 * Description: This is startup task function.
00093 *
00094 * Arguments  : pdata
00095 *
00096 * Returns    : none
00097 *
00098 * Note(s)    : 
00099 *********************************************************************************************************
00100 */
00101 void TaskStart(void *pdata){
00102    char count = 0; 
00103 
00104    pdata  = pdata;         /* Prevent compiler warning */
00105    TACTL |= MC1;           /* Start the Timer in Continuous mode. */
00106 
00107 #if (OS_TASK_STAT_EN > 0)
00108    OSStatInit();           /* Initialize uC/OS-II's statistics */ 
00109 #endif
00110   
00111    /* Initial value on the 7 Segment LCD */
00112    P2OUT = DISP_DP;
00113 
00114    /* Light up the display every second forever */
00115    while (1) 
00116    {
00117       if (count == 0)
00118       {   
00119          P3OUT &= ~DISP1_EN;
00120          count++;
00121       }
00122       else
00123       {   
00124          P3OUT |= DISP1_EN; 
00125          count--;
00126       }
00127 
00128            OSCtxSwCtr = 0;       
00129 
00130       /* Wait one second */
00131       OSTimeDlyHMSM(0, 0, 1, 0);
00132    }
00133 }
